name: Azure
aura: Increases Ally HP in All Battles by 25%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. This chance increases to 100% if the target has an [Increase SPD] buff.
skills.name: Lunge
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%
Level 6: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 40% of this Champion's MAX HP for 2 turns. This buff cannot be removed.
skills.name: Aegis

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places an extra hit if the target has a [Stun] debuff. The extra hit is always critical. Steals 50% of the target's Turn Meter if they are not under a [Stun] debuff.
skills.name: Coup de Grace
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Level 5: Damage +0
Level 6: Damage +0
Level 7: Cooldown -1
